definitions: a person whose job is to receive messages and organize the movement of people or vehicles, especially in the emergency services

examples.text: he told the dispatcher that his wife wasn't breathing
a cab driver responded to a call from his dispatcher
emergency police dispatchers received a call from the building at 8:45 a.m

shortDefinitions: person whose job is to receive messages and organize movement of people or vehicles

definitions: a person who sends something to a destination.
shortDefinitions: person who sends something to destination
